alert.note: Alert for Guam (Guam) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 25 at 8:44PM ChST by NWS Guam
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tiyan Guam has issued a * Urban and Small Stream Flood Advisory for... Guam * Until 1045 PM ChST. * At 841 PM ChST, satellite data shows a large complex of heavy showers heading southwest towards Guam. This should arrive near Andersen AFB within the next 15 minutes and progress southwest through the island. Locally heavy rainfall amounts of 1 to 3 inches are possible. * Some locations that will experience flooding include... Dededo, Tamuning, Yigo, Mangilao, Chalan Pago-Ordot, Barrigada, Yona, Hagatna Heights, Andersen AFB, Talofofo, Mongmong-Toto-Maite, Sinajana, Inarajan, Asan, Merizo, Piti, Santa Rita and Umatac.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. A Flood Advisory means river or stream flows are elevated, or ponding of water in urban or other areas is occurring or is imminent.
